channel.title: [fixed yay!]
channel.description:
Hello guys,
so I was adding castle wars onto my server, for that i made a castlewars.java file with all the code in it, and a castlewars.class. But whenever i try to add code in client.java of castlewars.java,
example:
if (CastleWars.isInCastleWars()) CastleWars.displayGameFrame();
I get an error which tells me the server cannot find the variable castlewars.
any ideas on how to fix this?
thanks

item.title: [fixed yay!]
item.dc:creator: @sertan8 sertan8
item.description:
@sertan8 wrote:

[quote=“DAn0194, post:19, topic:540729”]So you defiantly should use

Tell me the errors you receive.[/quote]

I added that piece of code but the server still doesn’t recognize the variable castlewars.

client.java:17242: error: cannot find symbol
if (castlewars.isInCastleWars())
^
symbol: variable castlewars
location: class client
client.java:17243: error: cannot find symbol
castlewars.displayGameFrame();
^
symbol: variable castlewars
location: class client
client.java:17244: error: cannot find symbol
if (castlewars.isInSaradomin() || castlewars.isInZamorak())
^
symbol: variable castlewars
location: class client
client.java:17244: error: cannot find symbol
if (castlewars.isInSaradomin() || castlewars.isInZamorak())
^
symbol: variable castlewars
location: class client
client.java:17245: error: cannot find symbol
castlewars.displayRemainingTime();
^
symbol: variable castlewars
location: class client
client.java:17246: error: cannot find symbol
int waitTime = PlayerHandler.waitTime;
^
symbol: variable waitTime
location: class PlayerHandler
client.java:17247: error: cannot find symbol
int gameTime = PlayerHandler.gameTime;
^
symbol: variable gameTime
location: class PlayerHandler

item.title: [fixed yay!]

item.description:
@Null_Amount wrote:

Classes should be upper CamelCase.

Refer to this page for information on how to non-statically reference a method.

item.title: [fixed yay!]
item.dc:creator: @sertan8 sertan8
item.description:
@sertan8 wrote:

oh wow i hadn’t.

i will do now and see if it works, thanks

edit:

I either did it wrong, or something else is causing the issue. I get these errors:

client.java:17241: error: non-static method isInCastleWars() cannot be reference
d from a static context
if (CastleWars.isInCastleWars())
^

castleWars.displayGameFrame();
^
symbol: variable castleWars
location: class client
client.java:17243: error: cannot find symbol
if (castleWars.isInSaradomin() || castleWars.isInZamorak())
^
symbol: variable castleWars
location: class client

^

castleWars.displayRemainingTime();
^

location: class client

int waitTime = PlayerHandler.waitTime;
^

location: class PlayerHandler

int gameTime = PlayerHandler.gameTime;
^

location: class PlayerHandler
server.java:40: error: cannot find symbol
CastleWars = new CastleWars();
^
symbol: variable CastleWars
location: class server
server.java:40: error: constructor CastleWars in class CastleWars cannot be appl
ied to given types;

^

found: no arguments
reason: actual and formal argument lists differ in length
